headline.print_headline: Egypt Charges 200 Islamist Militants With Bombings, Other Violence
headline.main: Egypt Charges 200 Islamist Militants With Bombings, Other Violence

docs.snippet: Egypt's public prosecutor charged 200 suspected Islamist militants on Saturday with "founding, leading and joining a terrorist organisation" and launching bomb and rocket attacks across the country....
docs.lead_paragraph: Egypt's public prosecutor charged 200 suspected Islamist militants on Saturday with "founding, leading and joining a terrorist organisation" and launching bomb and rocket attacks across the country.

headline.sub: Nigerian celebrities rally behind search of kidnapped
headline.main: Nigerian celebrities rally behind search of kidnapped

docs.snippet: Nigerian celebrities join protesters in calling for the rescue of over 200 girls kidnapped from their secondary school last month by Islamist Militants Boko Haram. Nathan Frandino reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nigerian celebrities join protesters in calling for the rescue of over 200 girls kidnapped from their secondary school last month by Islamist Militants Boko Haram. Nathan Frandino reports.

headline.print_headline: Plane With Smoke in Cockpit Returns to LAX
headline.main: Plane With Smoke in Cockpit Returns to LAX

docs.snippet: A United Airlines flight has arrived safely back at Los Angeles International Airport after smoke was reported in the cockpit and cabin during a flight to Hawaii....
docs.lead_paragraph: A United Airlines flight has arrived safely back at Los Angeles International Airport after smoke was reported in the cockpit and cabin during a flight to Hawaii.

headline.print_headline: Colorado Oil Train Spill Put at 6,500 Gallons
headline.main: Colorado Oil Train Spill Put at 6,500 Gallons

docs.snippet: The Union Pacific Railroad says 6,500 gallons of oil spilled when a train derailed in northern Colorado on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Union Pacific Railroad says 6,500 gallons of oil spilled when a train derailed in northern Colorado on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Central African Republic's Seleka Rebels Pick New Commander, Say to Regroup
headline.main: Central African Republic's Seleka Rebels Pick New Commander, Say to Regroup

docs.snippet: Central African Republic's former Seleka rebel coalition has appointed a new army commander and plans to regroup its scattered fighters, a spokesman said on Saturday, a move that could further deepen divisions in the war-torn country....
docs.lead_paragraph: Central African Republic's former Seleka rebel coalition has appointed a new army commander and plans to regroup its scattered fighters, a spokesman said on Saturday, a move that could further deepen divisions in the war-torn country.

headline.print_headline: Global Game Responds to Cries of 'Fore' With New Gimmicks
headline.main: Global Game Responds to Cries of 'Fore' With New Gimmicks

docs.snippet: Tiger Woods is the world's top-earning athlete and tournaments still lure blue-chip sponsors and huge TV rights but golf is losing millions of players, prompting desperate ideas to stem the tide....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods is the world's top-earning athlete and tournaments still lure blue-chip sponsors and huge TV rights but golf is losing millions of players, prompting desperate ideas to stem the tide.

headline.print_headline: Lonmin Expects Mass Return at Strike-Hit South Africa Platinum Mines
headline.main: Lonmin Expects Mass Return at Strike-Hit South Africa Platinum Mines

docs.snippet: World no. 3 platinum producer Lonmin said it anticipated a "mass return to work" on Wednesday at its strike-hit South African operations, according to an internal company memo to employees....
docs.lead_paragraph: World no. 3 platinum producer Lonmin said it anticipated a "mass return to work" on Wednesday at its strike-hit South African operations, according to an internal company memo to employees.

headline.print_headline: Texas Man Arrested for Suspected Premarital Sex With 16-Year-Old Wife
headline.main: Texas Man Arrested for Suspected Premarital Sex With 16-Year-Old Wife

docs.snippet: The marriage may be legal but the suspected premarital sex was not, authorities said on Saturday after arresting a 41-year-old Houston-area drama teacher for the alleged sexual assault of a child, his 16-year-old wife....
docs.lead_paragraph: The marriage may be legal but the suspected premarital sex was not, authorities said on Saturday after arresting a 41-year-old Houston-area drama teacher for the alleged sexual assault of a child, his 16-year-old wife.

docs.snippet: Readers comment on my column about the bang for the buck from educating girls worldwide....

headline.main: IndyCar Teams Making Quick Changes to Cars

docs.snippet: Helio Castroneves and most other IndyCar drivers know their crews have the toughest job in Indianapolis....
